title: Kylie Jenner serves body as ex Tyga appears to troll Travis Scott by sporting his Air Jordan collab
text:
The dramatic saga between Travis Scott, Kylie Jenner and her ex Tyga just keeps heating up as Tyga appears to be trolling Scott.

But Jenner doesn't appear fazed, as she continues serving looks on Instagram as usual.

The beauty mogul posted some snaps of herself serving body beside her neon blue Rolls Royce, captioned: 'Hello Monday.'

Manic Monday: Kylie Jenner posted some snaps of herself serving body beside her neon blue Rolls Royce, captioned: 'Hello Monday'

The 22-year-old sported a black denim jacket and pants set with bleach-distressed details, which accentuated her signature curves.

This comes the same day she deleted a video of her new $3 million Bugatti Chiron, following criticism from followers for flaunting her wealth.

Meanwhile, Jenner's ex Tyga, 29, is flaunting his wealth while apparently throwing shade at her most recent ex Travis Scott, 28.

The Taste artist took to his own Instagram earlier in the day with a photo of himself posing beside his red Ferrari.

Curvy display: The 22-year-old sported a black denim jacket and pants set with bleach-distressed details, which accentuated her signature curves

Subtle troll: Meanwhile, Jenner's ex Tyga appeared to troll her most recent ex Travis Scott, posting a photo of himself posing next to his red Ferrari as he sported a pair of Scott's Air Jordans

But it's what was on his feet that caught followers' attention, as he sported a pair of Scott's Air Jordans.

The photo was posted just two days after he and Jenner were spotted Saturday arriving separately to the same club, Hyde Lounge in West Hollywood.

The exes were also linked just last week when she was seen arriving at his recording studio at 2am Wednesday morning.

After sparking rumors that their romance had rekindled amid her split from Scott, Jenner tweeted on Thursday: 'The internet makes everything 100 times more dramatic than what it really is.

'There was no "2am date with Tyga." You see me drop two of my friends off at a studio that he happened to be at.'

Secret rendezvous: The photo was posted just two days after he and Jenner were spotted Saturday arriving separately to the same club, Hyde Lounge in West Hollywood

Rekindled romance? Tyga pulled up in his Ferrari, just days after she was seen arriving at his recording studio at 2am

But Tyga posted a cryptic blue cap emoji to his Instagram story shortly after, which can be code for 'liar.'

Jenner also cleared the air about Scott: 'Travis and I are on great terms and our main focus right now is Stormi!! our friendship and our daughter is priority.'

The couple announced last Tuesday that they'd split up weeks ago, as Jenner flew stag at Justin and Hailey Bieber's wedding in South Carolina.

A source close to the couple told E! News: 'Kylie and Travis aren't officially calling it quits on their relationship, but are taking space apart.

'It's not a firm split. They've been fighting again, but have still seen each other within this last month.'

The announcement was followed by rumors that Scott had been cheating on Jenner with model Rojean Kar, 27.

Just rumors: After sparking rumors that their romance had rekindled amid her split from Scott, Jenner took to Twitter to deny it

Alleged mistress: Meanwhile, it was rumored Scott had been cheating on Jenner with model Rojean Kar

Simply not true: But the Astroworld artist broke his silence on Friday, denying the rumors of his affair with Kar

But the Astroworld artist broke his silence on Friday, denying the rumors of his affair with Kar.

He posted to his Instagram story: 'It’s really affecting when u see false things said about u once again these false stories about me cheating are just simply not true. Focusing on life, music, and family at this moment is what’s real.'

Jenner and Scott began dating at Coachella in 2017, just weeks before she became pregnant with their first daughter Stormi.

With the announcement of their split, they've decided to share equal custody of the one-year-old.

The family made their last public appearance together in late August at the premiere of Scott's Netflix documentary Look Mom I Can Fly.
description: Tyga took to his Instagram earlier with a photo of himself posing beside his red Ferrari. But it's what was on his feet that caught followers' attention, as he sported a pair of Scott's Air Jordans.
